Profile: Multiple Chronic Care Condition Care Plan
Definition: This profile constrains the FHIR Care Plan Resource to represent the requirements of a care plan for patients with multiple chronic conditions.

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Care Plan Chronic Disease Conditions
Definition: This profile contains US Core Condition to chronic disease conditions and supporting information for use in the MCC FHIR Care Plan or other FHIR Care Plans

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Care Plan Goal
Definition: This profile constrains US Core Goal for use in the MCC FHIR Care Plan or other FHIR Care Plans

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Care Plan Laboratory Result Observation
Definition: This profile constrains the FHIR Care Plan Resource to represent the requirements of a care plan for patients with multiple chronic conditions.

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Care Plan Medication Request
Definition: This profile constrains US Core Medication Request for use in the MCC FHIR Care Plan or other FHIR Care Plans

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Care Plan Procedure
Definition: This profile constrains US Core Procedure for use in the MCC FHIR Care Plan or other FHIR Care Plans

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Diagnostic Report and Note
Definition: This profile constrains US Core Diagnostic Report and Note for use in the MCC FHIR Care Plan or other FHIR Care Plans

Profile: Multiple Chronic Condition Care Plan Family History
Definition: This profile constrains the FHIR Family Member History Resource for use in the MCC FHIR Care Plan or other FHIR Care Plans
